data.prayer: Father, let those from the 45,319 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Wuzhou, Guangxi, China
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the county of Wuzhou.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Wuzhou, Guangxi, China to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 542,430, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Wuzhou you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Wuzhou, Guangxi, China.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.section_summary:
the county of Wuzhou, Guangxi, China has a population of 597,400.

We estimate Wuzhou has 45,319 people who might know Jesus, 9,651 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 542,430 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: the county of Wuzhou has (about) 45,319 people who know Jesus, 9,651 people who know about him culturally, and 542,430 people who are far from Jesus.
